title: KARTHIK LIV
description: An unforgettable evening of soul-stirring melodies with Karthik at Takshashila '24 on March 1st. An enchanting magical experience to witness his iconic songs,spanning languages and emotions. From heartfelt ballads to foot-tapping hits,Karthik's concert promises an immersive musical journey like no other.An opportunity to experience the brilliance of Karthik live on stage,A night filled with music,memories,and pure joy.gg
